Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: On the basis of this new building block , we have designed and synthesized a series of new conjugated copolymers containing electron - rich unit benzodithiophene or electron - deficient unit bithiazole or benzothiadiazole and homopolymers.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| benzodithiophene |
| bithiazole |
| benzothiadiazole |
| homopolymers |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| benzodithiophene |
| bithiazole |
| benzothiadiazole |

I have removed the following entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name":

* "On the basis of this new building block" (this is a sentence that sets the context for the rest of the paragraph, but does not refer to a specific material name)
* "we have designed and synthesized" (this is a sentence that describes the action being taken, but does not refer to a specific material name)
* "a series of new conjugated copolymers" (this is a sentence that describes the type of polymers being discussed, but does not refer to a specific material name)
* "containing electron - rich unit benzodithiophene or electron - deficient unit bithiazole or benzothiadiazole" (this is a sentence that describes the structure of the polymers, but does not refer to a specific material name)
* "and homopolymers" (this is a sentence that describes the type of polymers being discussed, but does not refer to a specific material name)
